name: Yerka Mig
Lore: 'An Imperial bureaucrat with high security clearance who resigned and fled in remorse after the occupation of his home planet, Ralltiir. Now a fugitive from the ISB.',
Text: 'Deploy at any location. You may move Mig like a character. Target an opponent''s character, who may apprehend (cancel) Mig by reaching same location. Until then, during all battles at same and adjacent sites to Mig, opponent''s total power is -1.',
